item.title: ECO108 Topic 1 Ten Principles of Economics
item.description: Introduction to Economics The word economy comes from the Greek work oikonomos, which means “one who manages a household”. Economics is the study of How society manages its scarce resources. Topic 1 Ten Principles of Economics Principle 1: People Face Trade-Offs One classic trade-off - “guns (national defense) and butter (consumer goods)”. Another trade-off - efficiency and equality. Principle 2: The Cost of Something Is What You Give Up to Get It
